description: This file defines an Angular standalone component named SidebarComponent that interacts with a NotesService to manage and display categories and note states within a sidebar UI.

classes.name: SidebarComponent
classes.description: Angular component managing the sidebar UI for note categories and archived state, utilizing NotesService for data operations.

methods.name: ngOnInit
methods.description: Lifecycle hook that initializes the component by loading categories and performing an initial search.

methods.name: activeCategoryId
methods.description: Returns the current active category ID or null if none is selected.

methods.name: isArchived
methods.description: Returns true if the archived filter is active.

methods.name: selectAll
methods.description: Selects all notes by clearing category filter and setting archived to false.

methods.name: selectArchived
methods.description: Filters to show only archived notes.

methods.name: selectCategory
methods.description: Filters notes by the specified category ID.

methods.name: categories
methods.description: Returns the list of note categories.
